title: Priceless Proverbs - Funny Happens When Kids Finish Famous Sayings
description: Priceless Proverbs is the result of hundreds of interviews with young children ages three to twelve, who were presented with the first half of a famous saying or well-known proverb and then asked to finish it themselves.Their candid and oftentimes exquisite answers, combined with their crayon illustrations, have now been made available for all to enjoy, in this little collection calledâ€¦ Priceless Proverbs.
author: Kristi  Porter
